metadata.title: CVE-2017-8812 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3, and 1.29.x before 1.29.2allows remote attackers to inject > (greater than) characters via the idattribute of a headline.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.4-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.4-1').
